node.text: You stand at the gates of the ancient city of Eldoria. Legends say the Crystal of Power is hidden within. The guard looks at you suspiciously.
The guard grins and takes your gold. "Stay out of trouble," he mutters, opening the gate. You are in the market square.
You draw your sword, but the guard is faster. He sounds the alarm. Arrows rain down. Your adventure ends here.
You find a loose brick in the wall and squeeze through. You find yourself in a dark alleyway behind the castle.
The tavern is lively. An old wizard in the corner beckons you. He offers you a map for a drink.
You approach the castle gates. They are heavily guarded. There is no way in from here.

choices.choice: Go back and find another way

node.text: The sewers are smelly but empty. You follow a tunnel that leads directly under the throne room!
You climb the wall, but a loose stone gives way. You fall into the moat. The crocodiles look hungry.
The wizard gives you a map showing a secret entrance. You follow it and find the Crystal Chamber!
You leave the tavern and wander the streets until nightfall. You never find the crystal.
You emerge in the throne room. The King is asleep. The Crystal is on a pedestal next to him.
You have the Crystal of Eldoria! You are the new protector of the realm.
